title: do a check if all fields if's value_exprs have a block for the value expr
description:
value_expr = match value_expr {
(ValueExpr::Duck(x), loc) if x.is_empty() => (ValueExpr::Block(vec![]), loc),
x @ (ValueExpr::Block(_), _) => x,
_ => panic!("Function must be block"),
source_line: // todo: do a check if all fields if's value_exprs have a block for the value expr
